definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: With BladeSystem, server organization is not tied to function.
sentences.chinese: 随着刀片服务器组织无关的功能。

sentences.english: The disagreement among the family members healed over with time.
sentences.chinese: 家庭成员之间的不和随着时间的流逝而消失。

sentences.english: The temperature of cold-blooded animals change with the temperature of the surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 冷血动物的体温随着周围的环境的改变而变化。

sentences.english: It soon turned into black smog as the smoke of the city poured into the air.
sentences.chinese: 随着城市的烟排入天空，白雾很快变成了黑色烟雾。

sentences.english: As the police moved in, the hostages were running out, he said.
sentences.chinese: 随着警方进入该区域，人质也都四散跑出。

sentences.english: Jung's concept of the ego evolved over time.
sentences.chinese: 容格关于自我的概念是随着时间而发展。

sentences.english: As time gose by, man is making the earth sike .
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，人类正在令地球受到破坏。

sentences.english: Bond, comes with the war, is my understanding after read this chapter.
sentences.chinese: 债券，随着战争来临时，是我阅读本章后的理解。

sentences.english: With the oil prices up, people would rather to use E-bike.
sentences.chinese: 随着石油价格的上涨，人们更加愿意使用电单车。

sentences.english: With the development of detective methods, the concept of transdifferentiation is being accepted by people.
sentences.chinese: 随着检测手段的进步，转分化正逐渐被人们认同。

sentences.english: The prevalence rates increased with increasing gravidity or parity.
sentences.chinese: 出生缺陷发生率随着孕产次的增加而明显提高。

sentences.english: And, that radius rotates around the wheel as the wheel is moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 这条半径随着车轮的向前移动在旋转着。

sentences.english: But just as quickly as new members come, they also go.
sentences.chinese: 随着新成员的加入，老队员也很快离去。

sentences.english: Following the roar, out rushed a lion from among the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 随着一声吼叫，呼地从树林里窜出一只狮子来。

sentences.english: If you pivot in another direction, the app follows.
sentences.chinese: 如果你转向另一个方向，它也会随着变化。

sentences.english: How ungrateful then that, as the talks limp towards collapse, accusing fingers are being pointed at America.
sentences.chinese: 随着对话走向破裂，大家非常不领情面得指责美国。

definition: day by day/more and more/increasingly/more and more with each passing day
to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day/more (or better etc) with each passing day
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
(increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
(of time) to elapse or pass/(of a situation) to develop or evolve
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
to accompany/to follow/to occur together with/concomitant
